Text: Now this definitely seems like a trap.
Down we go...
But how far down?
Is it just me...or does this seem...different?
Dangerous, certainly.
Aaand there are more.
If you could clear the path...?
Broken machines...
2B must have gotten here first.
We made it...
Am I dead? I don't feel dead.
<huff> <pant>

My thanks, you saved our skins out there.
We're headed home, lads─quick march!
Haha! Found them! Their scouting days are well and truly over!
Blaz! Velibor! It's our time to shine!
Indeed.
None shall escape my blade.
Come, Ghun Gun! Our friends need help!
Be careful, yes?
Come and visit us again!
I haven't the faintest what's going on, but you'd best keep moving!
There is nowhere to run!
Just when I think there's a commotion...
Lucky we chanced to be testing some Talos!
Take care, you hear?
Well, it's back to the workshop with this lot...
Why do they glow like that? Weird, I tell you!
These are the ones we should play with, right?
We Nu Mou are not wont to fight, but we know when we must!
Whatever's going on, you've got my hammer!
Just another job for a bounty hunter.
I've had far worse than this lot.
Not sin eaters by the look of them.
Whatever they are, they're not to be trifled with.
Keep it steady, eh, catboy? Don't want no arrow in my arse by accident.
Wha─!? Do you take me for a craven!?
Ugh, I would kill for a drink right now...
When this is over, I'll buy you as many as you want!
Oho, does that offer extend to me as well?
Save the talk for the tavern! We're not out of the woods yet!
Ack, no bloody end in sight...
Press on! We'll hold them here!
Victory is ours!
Empty metal shells. Barely worth my time.
I find little satisfaction in such feeble prey.
My blade is blunted, withdrawal the only available course of action.
It's no good, boys. We'd best call it a day.
What a disgrace!
Now I have you!
You won't escape me this time!
Aaahhhk!
Neigh!
<whinny>
No! I won't let you have him!
I'll do everything in my power to keep him safe!
Neeeigh!
Kshaaaaaah!
There is plenty more where that came from!
Kweeeh!
Kweh, kweh!
That's the spirit!
Tear them apart!
This fight's as good as won!
Now strike!
Go back to whatever hole you crawled out from!
You haven't beaten us yet!
I will watch you burn!
Glllgh... Burn, burn, burn!
My magick is infallible!
More power! More power!
Bear witness to my might!
Time to end this.
Flame, take flight!
You shan't be so lucky a second time!
Will you burn, or will you melt?
Hahahaha! Now do you see?

I have enjoyed our time together,
but all things must come to an end.
I am just getting started!

Though it galls me to use such underhanded tactics,
for you, poison will suffice.
I am the inferno!
Ashes to ashes!
The light of my flame grows dim...
Ha...ha... No, not yet...
Grrruuunnnh...
Raaawrrrh!
As if we don't have enough to contend with...
May the fallen find peace.
Well, it made for a change of pace, if nothing else!
Let us begin.
Is that all?
I'll rend you to pieces!
Might want to watch your step!
Can you withstand this!?
For the future of Bozja!
Today, we take back our homeland!
For freedom!
Death to the oppressors!
Keep going!
Follow the Blade!
You can't keep a good Bozjan down!
One step closer to freedom!
We'll never surrender!
You imperials'll have to try harder than that!
This isn't getting us anywhere. Retreat!
We've been outmatched...
No choice left but to withdraw!
They've gotten the better of us!
Am I no better than a novice?
Even with this blade, I have been found wanting.
Looks like I've gotten carried away.
No! I'll not die in a place like this!

I've still got some fight left in me...
Not much, though.
You'll have to fight the good fight without me...
Ha! Fat lot of good those fancy weapons did you!

For the glory of...uh...
How does it go, again?
Anyway, I'll kill you to death!
Fresh meat!
I will grind your bones!
Time to spill some Bozjan blood!
Stay still and let me kill you!
No! Not the garula!
You're no match for the mighty Daguza!
Ow! That hurts, you know!
Must flee!
Run away! Run away!
Ungh... My limbs...
Bwahaha! Is that the best you can muster?
Too weak!
Finished so soon?
They got anything worth pinching?
For Bozja!
Battlefield or no, this is our land and we must defend it!
With me!
Excellent work, Blade  !
They're more resilient than they look. Fall back!
It seems I've lost the upper hand...
All my hate...I bring to bear!
My, my. What a pathetic display!
I'll leave these sorry wretches to you. Have fun!
I, in the meantime, shall be spending time with my newest pet.
I...I've never seen anything like this before!
Nevertheless, they'll fall like all the rest!
It looks like we've cowed them for now.
The injured have made their escape, and I suggest we do likewise.
How I have waited for this moment!
The castrum is all but ours!
We shall lead the way to victory!
Attack!
The end is in sight!
I knew we could do it!
Let's press on!
Surrender now and no one gets hurt!
Follow my lead!
See what your villainy has wrought!
Behind me!
Stand aside! I have no interest in the likes of you!
Sing, my blade!
Our work is far from over.
Their leaders yet elude us.
Your movements betray you.
We'll smash right through them!
I've had training dummies that put up more of a fight!
Haha! Who's next?
Just another notch on my hilt!
Now's our chance at glory!
This is easier than I thought!

Blaz, Velibor!
We've got them on the run!
Take...this!
Hah!
Yah!
Damn you, rebels!
That's far enough!
Press the advantage!
Imperial dog!
Give them no quarter!
You think you can beat us on our own turf!?
By fang and claw shall they be rent!
May my foe be trampled underfoot!
My hubris has become my undoing...
Cut them down!
I want that one's head on a pike!
Hold the line!

I don't like the look of that.
I get the feeling it's not the usual imperial magitek...

MUST SWEEP...MUST CLEAN...
...BZZZT...
MUST...MUST...KILL...
Keep your wits about you, everyone!
Prepare yourselves!
Imperials! How did they get so close!?
Let that be a lesson to you!
The day is ours!

So they would weave their magicks in service of the Empire?
Conscripts or no, they must be dealt with.
Forward!
If we're to earn our freedom, we can't let the Bozjans get the better of us!

Remember, we're only here for reconnaissance.
If things take a turn for the worse, you are to retreat immediately.
Understood, Dyunbu!
Those still bearing injuries must fall back.
But I can still fight!
We won't abandon you, Dyunbu!
Please, you must retreat!
Leave this lot to us!
You're in no fit state to continue. Fall back, I say!

How can we hope to build Gabranth's new nation...
if this is all we're capable of?
We can't withstand this attack any longer!
You never stood a chance against Gunnhildr's Blades!
Haha! And don't come back!

How can they counteract my magicks so easily?
I must retreat, find another way!
But Xeven is invincible!
It's no good!

Why will you Bozjans not listen to reason?
Place your faith in Gabranth, as we have!
Death to the Resistance!
I'm gonna make you bleed!
Surrender or die!
Resistance is futile! Haha, get it? Because they're the... Never mind.
Know the depths of your folly!
For the IVth Legion!
You'll give up for good if you've got any sense!
For great justice.
When you arrive in the seven hells, tell 'em the IVth Legion sent you!

Another fine victory!
Let's head back and celebrate.
Why won't they just die!?
Fall back!
How could we lose to this filth?
Better to run than to die!
Target confirmed.

Sufficient armaments remaining.
Continuing with attack.
Ceruleum consumption within acceptable limits.

Target within line of sight.
Opening fire.
Arise, and devour!
Cast thy shadow!
Before my blade, you are nothing.
A futile endeavor.
You've never seen a blade like this!
It's too late for you!
Hyah!
This one's mine!
My beasts will be the death of you!
Time to repay Lyon's trust!
Lyon has taught me well!
Away with you!
I've no time to deal with you vermin!
See how they run!
We'll beat some sense into you!
Don't blame me if you end up dead!

The IVth Legion don't take no prisoners!
Well, except when we do...
You'll run if you know what's good for you!
Better to flee while you still can!
Hasn't there been enough bloodshed?
Can't you see? Our ideals are the same!
If you won't listen to reason, you leave me with no choice!
Now you've gone too far!
Strike hard and swift, as the eagle!
By Gunnhildr's Blades, we shall be victorious!
This is how we Bozjans do battle!
For a better tomorrow!
Freedom for Bozja! Freedom for all!
Stick with me! I'll keep you from harm.
Pathetic!
Not worth my time!
Your life is mine for the taking!
Fear not. Your death will be swift!
Let's take it one imperial at a time.
Watch my back, would you?
By our powers combined!
Now for something special!
Today is a good day to die! For you, that is!
Out of the way!
Enough of these lackeys! I want their leader!
Take a good look, imperials. You'll only get to see this once!
Much as it galls me, we've no choice but to retreat!
Oh, the ignominy!
REQUESTING REINFORCEMENTS.
Just when I thought things couldn't get any worse!

SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
ENTERING SAFE MODE...
SYSTEMS OFFLINE...

I should have spent more time on its restoration.
No matter. The data I have gleaned will prove most useful.

I just heard a voice!
And not a particularly pleasant one...

Even in its incomplete state, it was extremely effective.
I look forward to unearthing more of its kind in the clockwork city...
I take full responsibility for this abject failure!
Oh, dear...
Not today!
Naught to worry about.
I have slept long enough!
I'm in your debt.
Once more, then!
Allow me!
If I may!
There!
Hold still!
Something special for you!
Stubborn!
Are you all right?
I'll tend your wounds.
Hold on!
Right, then...
Show me what you can do!
Just the beginning!
My shield will not buckle!
In one fell swoop!
Our tale will not end here!
Remember, these are not unthinking machines, they are soldiers, which makes them all the more dangerous.
Forward!
This is as far as you go!
Not another step closer!
I have you now!
You're finished!
Roar, Nidhogg! Roar!

Significant damage sustained.
Adjusting battle parameters.
That's it! Well fought, everyone!

All of you, fall back!
We'll have to rethink our strategy.
Chase and char!
Dance and wither!
Burst and burn!
Hunt and scorch!
Strike and sear!
Our freedom awaits!
We've come too far to lose it all now!
My shield...is impregnable...
Damn! We must find a way past his defense!
My arrows don't do a thing!
Uhhh...
Graaargh...
Unnnghhh...
Ahhh...
Resistance troops approaching!
And not a moment too soon. The time has come to prove my worth to Lyon!
Grrrrrr...
Many thanks for the materials! With this, the construction can begin in earnest!
First things first, we'll need to clear our path of debris before we can get to buildin'.
For the future of Ishgard, let's give it our all!
Your efforts on our behalf are most appreciated. We need all the hands we can get!
Featherfall's a mess of debris at the moment, and it's our job to do somethin' about that.
Remember, we're not just pushing rocks around. We're forgin' a path to a new day in Ishgard!
We're all stocked up on materials! Time to commence concerted works!
There's still debris in Featherfall that wants for clearin', and that's where you come in.
Many thanks! We'd be lost without artisans like you.
To your places, everyone! It's time to get to work!
Today, we're goin' to make the streets of Featherfall positively shine!
Any last specks of debris are to be cleared away!
Look alive, everyone! We're movin' on to the next phase of concerted works!
Grab the supplies you need, and let's pave the way forward in Featherfall!
These streets will be home to the Firmament's new center of commerce! I don't want to see a single stone out of place!
Startin' from today, we're gonna be puttin' up buildings!
You'll find everythin' you need in the supply piles. Now let's get to work!
One day, this place will house a branch of the Skysteel Manufactory, and a residence hall to boot!
Today, we'll be finishin' work on the manufactory branch and residence hall!
This is what we've been buildin' up towards, so let's give it all we've got!
Let's build something that will stand as a monument to our craftsmanship!
Look sharp, all of you! It's time to begin concerted works!
House-buildin' is the order of the day, so grab some materials and get to work!
No rest until the streets of Featherfall are lined with stately residences!
Thanks to you, we've all the materials we need, and then some! Time to commence concerted works!
Today we're puttin' the finishing touches on these houses. You know where to find the supplies you need!
Show us your skill, and build houses any adventurer'd be happy to call home!
It's that time again─time to begin concerted works!
Today we'll be workin' on still more houses! You know where to find the supplies you need!
This'll be Featherfall's last set of houses, so let's make 'em our finest yet!
This is it, everyone─the final stage of construction here in Featherfall! No restin' till the job is done!
Just a bit more work and these houses will be ready for livin' in. You know what needs to be done!
This is the last set of houses. I want to see your best work yet!
In today's concerted works, we'll be cleanin' up the Abacus!
That means clearin' away any debris that's blockin' our way!
It's not a pretty job, but just think of the magnificent market that'll be standin' here someday!
Time to get to work again! We need all the hands we can get!
Today, we're clearin' away the last little bits of debris that still clutter the Abacus!
The more thorough we are today, the more work we'll save ourselves in the next stage─so no slackin'!
Thanks to our artisans, we're fully stocked with supplies. Now let's get to work!
It's time to pave the Abacus! Grab yourselves some supplies and get to it!
With all these stairwells, it's not going to be easy─so watch your step!
This is it, everyone! With just a bit more effort, we'll at long last be finishin' our work on the Abacus!
Help yourself to any materials, and let the pavin' begin!
Artisans of Ishgard, I want to see everythin' you've got!
Today's task is fixin' up the residence hall we call the Hoarfrost. All together, now!
You know where to find the supplies, and you know what to do with 'em! Now look alive!
The Hoarfrost is no humble little hovel. We're going to need a steady scaffold to do the job!
Today we're goin' to continue work on the scaffold for the Hoarfrost!
Take all the materials you need, and let's get to work!
To scale the heights of the Hoarfrost, our scaffold must reach to the sky!
I promise you're going to be damned proud of yourself when the Hoarfrost stands in full glory!
Help yourself to all the materials you need, and don't let up until the work is done!
Remember, the building you're workin' on just may be your future home!
This marks the culmination of all our efforts! Now let's build a residence that'll be the envy of the realm!
We're this close to finishin' work on the Hoarfrost! This is no time to slack off!
Hear me, artisans? It's time to put the final touches on your masterwork!
Ugh!
Got a moment?
Don't underestimate chocobos! Especially these red ones all the way from Dalmasca!
Kweh! Kweh! Kweh!
Ha! I'd thought you'd be dead by now! You're stronger than you look!
Why not leave the Resistance and join me instead? Pays well and the grub ain't bad either!
You'd try recruiting your enemy in the middle of a battle!? Unbelievable!
Kweeeh!
And why not? No use in me recruiting you after you're dead!
Kweeeeeeh!
Where did that massive chocobo come from!?
Erk! Better run to fight another day!
It's like the fall of Dalamud all over again! Run for it!
To think it would come to this... Withdraw!
Hmph! Not so tough after all!
Kweh! Kweh! Kweeeh!

Basic motor function checks complete.
Now for the defensive mechanisms.
I knew those Bozjan churls would arrive sooner or later.

My creation has performed below expectations.
Your assistance was most welcome, Bozjans. Until next time!

They hardly seem worth killing.
Perhaps next time, they will put up more of a fight.
Haha! Excellent work, my friend!

Nope, bugger this.
Time to run!
The enemy is here, and they've brought their pets!
Let them come. My flames will consume them all!
My beasts will sup on your flesh!
Without their master, they will fall into disarray!
Take this!
Lyon will never forgive me!
And let that be a lesson, you curs!
Like lambs to the slaughter!
We must regroup!
I doubt they'll offer much sport.
It must be here. Keep looking!
Watch out for Bozjans. We can't let them interfere!
Understood...
Executing orders...
Test subject confirmed...

That's our opponent!?
Doesn't look like much of a threat to me!
What did I say? We had them beaten from the outset!
So much for the power of magitek, eh?

This isn't my idea of a fair fight.
Time to call it a day!
Bring me as many parts as you can!
Troops, fall back! We'll handle this.
You'll have to do better than that, Bozjans!

That should put them in their place.
All right, everyone. Return to the castrum.
Warrior of Darkness! Thank goodness you're here!
These phantoms have been appearing out of thin air!
Time to get serious.
Nowhere to hide!

If there's one thing being a beastmaster has taught me,
it's to watch where you step.
Let's see how resilient you really are!
Understood!
All right, Bozjans. You've got two options.
Die facedown in the dirt, or surrender!
I say we kill 'em!
You make this look easy,  !
I could use someone like you! Why not join me?
SheHe would never throw in herhis lot with the likes of you!
Impressive! That was no mean feat!
Join us!
I'll even give you the choicest cuts of meat!
Oof! Seems I was right about you!
I'll win you over, just you see!
A brute he may be, but he knows talent when he sees it!
We can't afford to be waylaid here any longer. Withdraw!
Ha! We'll let you go for now, but one of these days, you'll fight under my banner!
I'll be waiting!
You won't regret it!

You're too kind!
I'll leave her and the...horse thing...in your care!

They have found us, it seems.
I shall do my part to protect the monoceros!

There's the unicorn, and the traitor to boot!
We need the beast alive, which is more than can be said for the girl!
We'll show you what happens to deserters!
You thought you could get away, did you?
Commencing attack!
Neigh!
Oh, what's this? A beautiful specimen, fit for inclusion in my menagerie!
No! You keep your hands off of him, Clarricie!
Don't let them escape!
Seize them!
We need it alive, but don't be afraid to smack some sense into it!
Neighhh!
You lowly wretch! How dare you!
I'll take this out of your hide!

I think that's the last of them.
And yet... No, it must be my mind playing tricks on me.

Above all, the monoceros is safe.
You have my sincerest thanks.
<whinny>

It seems I'm done for...
Run, my dear monoceros! Save yourself!
Neighhh!
Let's see how you like this!
Your time is up!
Hyah!

I want that unicorn!
Slaughter the rest!
Insolent cur!
I have made my choice!
Neigh!
Plenty of meat to go around!
It comes!
Aaah!
Run! Faster!
Stay away! Away I say!
Someone, help!
Is that...? The shark is here! Everyone, to safety!
Our moment has come! Summon the Bombard!
A raging inferno is at our beck and call!
